Nordvargr.title: Alpha Ænigma
Nordvargr.about:
Cutting out the middle man - go to
www.nordvargr.com/shop?category=Digital
to purchase your digital copy!
ᚾᛟᚢ II // ᚦᛟᚦ ᚷᛁᚷ is Henrik Nordvargr Björkk and Thomas Ekelund (not to be confused with their other project "Det Kätterska Förbund").
With every repetition of these curses, the emanating energies are multiplied by one order of magnitude. Each current becomes a shining dagger that cuts through the flesh, and bone, and souls of treacherous men.
Recite these names;
AKHAS!
TERAGMON!
ETHAIN!
QAA!
And harms bane shall cleave them atwain.
Let them be plagued by disease.
Let them be plagued by misfortune.
Let their souls wander, aimlessly,
in eternal night.
Rob them of their joy, their laughter,
and make their every day a horrid nightmare.
This is our will and purpose
This is the kindling of our flame
A curse to end all curses
To taint their unspoken names
-------------------------------------
These ritual sounds are to be considered a living curse, one thats spirals out of control and gains more momentum for every time it is recited/played.
Nordvargr.credits:
released July 21, 2018
Released on CD by  www.oldeuropacafe.com  in DVD-sized Digipac.

Nordvargr.title: Business solutions for the active terrorist
Nordvargr.about:
Under Ulvtharm's leadership as Chairman and CEO, Nar Mattaru AB acquired Nordvargr Inc in 1999, and two years later merged with the venerable, but struggling, Meinertz Holdings to form econocon, the country's largest audio investment venture.
Ulvtharm led the firm from significant operating losses to five consecutive years of record profits with a return on equity among the highest in the noisemaking industry.
On January 17, 2006, the firm filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection following the massive exodus of most of its listeners and drastic losses in its stock.
This release is the only heritage from these great days of profit and oppression. Hail Mammon!
Nordvargr.credits:
released March 11, 2016
Recorded @ Nar Mattaru, Karlskoga - Sweden - October 2000.
Remastered March 2016 by Henrik Nordvargr Björkk.

Nordvargr.title: Daath
Nordvargr.about:
Cutting out the middle man - go to
www.nordvargr.com/shop?category=Digital
to purchase your digital copy!
"Nordvargr returns to Cyclic Law with yet another crushing offering that follows in the footsteps of it’s highly acclaimed predecessor "Metempsychosis” and develops the sound even further. Daath was recorded back to back with MZ. 412´s "Svartmyrkr" and the creative maelstrom that infused that masterpiece also can be heard in Nordvargr´s solo efforts. The ambient parts have been put in the backseat in order to make way for heavy percussion, stringed and bowed instrumentation and thundering vocals delivered with serious intent. The title refers to the false sephira which also can be interpreted as the great abyss that needs to be crossed in order to attain higher knowledge; a fitting analogy for the ordeals that took place during the composition of this album as well as a perfect symbol of the new sound and direction of Nordvargr's creative universe."
Nordvargr.credits:
released December 21, 2019
To order the album (CD/vinyl) go to:  www.cycliclaw.com
Limited tape version available from Cloister Recordings
Download lyrics booklet:  tinyurl.com/yedwkwo6

Nordvargr.title: Konung Krönt i Blod / Salve Teragmon
Nordvargr.about:
Cutting out the middle man - go to
www.nordvargr.com/shop?category=Digital
to purchase your digital copy!
From the Cyclic Law release info:
"After collaborating on each others previous albums and also working together as Det Kätterska Förbund the idea of messing with each others music came naturally. On this limited 7" you find Nordvargr giving Trepaneringsritualen's "Konung Krönt i Blod" a gritty and in-your-face treatment and Trepaneringsritualen putting together a whole band making his mammoth version of Nordvargr´s "Salve Teragmon". The result is as devastating as you could predict!
Artwork by Dehn Sora & T × R × P. "
Nordvargr.credits:
released May 1, 2019
Limited edition of 300 copies on black vinyl, comes with exclusive logo sticker.
SOLD OUT.

Nordvargr.title: Lidaverken Del I: Att i Vådeld Förgås
Nordvargr.about:
Cutting out the middle man - go to
www.nordvargr.com/shop?category=Digital
to purchase your digital copy!
"Cold Spring presents two Swedish titans - NORDVARGR (MZ.412) and ᚦᛟᚦ ᚷᛁᚷ (TREPANERINGSRITUALEN) - teaming up for a bludgeoning dose of Death Industrial majesty.
Det Kätterska Förbund, consisting of the two giants dominating the Death Industrial world - Thomas Ekelund (Trepaneringsritualen) + Henrik Nordvargr Björkk (MZ.412) - has been slowly and methodically working for almost 5 years to finish the first album of this double-headed abomination. Patience richly rewarded."
Nordvargr.credits:
released June 18, 2021
Inspelat vid Nar Mattaru, Den 63:DJE Länken samt Tabernakel des Roten Phœnix 2016 - 2020 e.v.
Audiomaster färdigställd av Martin Bowes.
Physical copies:  coldspring.co.uk

Nordvargr.title: Metempsychosis
Nordvargr.about:
Cutting out the middle man - go to
www.nordvargr.com/shop?category=Digital
to purchase your digital copy!
From the Cyclic Law press materials:
The concept of Metempsychosis - the transmigration of the soul, was the basic concept for the new album from Henrik Nordvargr Björkk. However, not in the classic reincarnative sense, but as a study of how souls rather than being judged by a higher power themselves chooses what flesh to inhabit. To freely roam between the dimensions and to cling on to any form of life at will. These cycles of life and death, bound in part by flesh, inspired to create these tense and organic atmospheres - all synonymous with the journey of the soul.
The result is a natural evolution of Nordvargr´s trademark darkness into more rythmic and vocal compositions where the confrontational stance of Henrik´s other projects shines through; from the harsh bombast of MZ. 412 to the vocals of Anima Nostra, all surrounded by the darkest Scandinavian aura of horror.
Featuring guest vocals by Trepaneringsritualen and artwork by Dehn Sora.
Nordvargr.credits:
released March 31, 2018
Released by Cyclic Law on CD/Vinyl/Tape.
Visit  www.cycliclaw.com  to pre order physical formats now!
(they also got fresh Nordvargr shirts etc...)

Nordvargr.title: MX.TAPE.RN-2018 (V2)
Nordvargr.about:
A free mixtape consisting of old and new, released and unreleased, original and remixed/demo music.
The contents will not be disclosed or indexed as it is of no importance.
Mixed down to old and used analogue tape (Sony HF-ES), then back to digital to get that perfect degraded sound.
NOTE: A mixtape is not a permanent thing. Sometimes a mix does not feel good and you remake it. Current mixtape is V2 and was updated June 6.
Nordvargr.credits: released May 6, 2018

Nordvargr.title: Resignation I​-​II​-​III
Nordvargr.about:
Cutting out the middle man - go to
www.nordvargr.com/shop?category=Digital
to purchase your digital copy!
Released on 3 CD/LP Box set on Cyclic Law.
"From it’s inception delving into the more gaseous realms of dubby techno and evolving through the years towards the harder and nosier side of electronics, Nordvargr’s unique grasp of the genre and his will to turn it upside down culminates in a dreamy soundtrack-like voyage, where deep atmospherics are pierced by rhythmically hypnotic and abrasive passages. A true tour de force that will stand as a true gem for any fan of the fringes of techno and electronic music."
Note: Vinyl version of "I" is a completely different version / mixdown than the CD/digital version.
Nordvargr.credits: released July 22, 2022

Nordvargr.title: Semen
Nordvargr.about:
A unique and extremely disturbing masterpiece of fleshy, cold and perverse avantgarde dark / death electronic soundscape nightmares, once even called "the most fucked up thing I ever heard". You have never heard anything like this before, and never will again.
Semen is a collaboration between Jakob Nybo / Henrik Nordvargr Björkk recorded winter 2005 - early 2006 at Vital Room and Villa Bohult. Mastered by J. Ulvtharm / Nordvargr MZ. 412 at Nar Mattaru.
Photography and design – Bombthedot / Salt
Nordvargr.credits:
released July 3, 2020
CD version in digipack released April 2006 on Vital.

order the whole limited edition set (LP+CD) at  www.oldeuropacafe.com/en/catalog/category/nordvargr-murkhr

Nordvargr.title: Seven days of pain
Nordvargr.about:
Celebrating 21 years since recording this album this year - fueled by hate and personal demons I needed an exorcism of sorts, and this was the documentation of that process. Noise heals.
"This is a cattle prod jolt to the system, leaving in it's wake a distinct burning sensation followed by the dull roar of frazzled nerve endings."
Nordvargr.credits:
released January 5, 2022
Recorded at Ringmuskel Studio June 2001 / Villa Bohult July 2001.
Sources: EDP Wasp, Mini Moog, shortwave radio, assorted FX pedals.
Mastered by Philip Easter.
Artwork (prototype version) by Jonathan Kan.
Originally released 2003 on CD by Black Plagve USA.

Nordvargr.title: Sigillum ACHAM
Nordvargr.about:
The third part of the SIGILLUM series which explores practical magick and musik in various combinations.
Intended as background music to meditation. Do not play casually and/or without focus. This is not entertainment.
Nordvargr.credits:
released February 19, 2016
Recorded @ Nar Mattaru January 2016 by Henrik Nordvargr Björkk as part of a meditation ritual.
All proceeds from sales will go into new projects aimed at enlightenment, introspection and development. Your support is needed and appreciated.

Nordvargr.title: Sleep Therapy
Nordvargr.about:
Sleep Therapy - an experiment with electroencephalography technology.
The dominant frequency in the brain's EEG pattern determines the current state of the brain. For example, If the amplitude of the Theta range frequencies is highest, then the brain is said to be in the Theta state. If external stimulus is applied to the brain, it becomes possible to entrain the brain frequency from one brain state to another (this phenomenon is called Frequency Following Response).
The purpose of the soundscapes of Sleep Therapy is to affect your brain's state to achieve a change of your sleeping behaviour, dreams and will - the result of this treatment is for you alone to experience.
The contents of these recordings are all ambient soundscapes to which EVP recordings and Theta / Delta frequencies have been added.
This is not entertainment.
Nordvargr.credits:
released October 21, 2011
.
Directions of use
Use high quality stereo headphones and adjust the volume to a comfortable level. Try to fall asleep while listening to the sounds. If you get distracted, reduce the volume. The Theta / Delta waves are effective even at very low volume. Repeat the treatment for seven days.
If changes in your sleeping behaviour occurs, please report them to nordvargr@nordvargr.com.
Don´t drone and drive.
Recorded at the Electro / Fiber Laboratory, Hägersten.
All compositions and frequencies generated by Henrik Nordvargr Björkk January - February 2002.
Photographs by Tord Saxin.

Nordvargr.title: Tantum Melior
Nordvargr.about:
Cutting out the middle man - go to
www.nordvargr.com/shop?category=Digital
to purchase your digital copy!
After the success of 2018’s ”Metempsychosis” album, Nordvargr´s most song based recordings ever, we asked close friends and collaborators to create their own interpretations of songs from the album. The result is an interesting blend of styles and methods that expands the Nordvargr universe even further. With exclusive reworks by MZ. 412, Ordo Rosarius Equilibrio, Vassafor, Visions, Kristoffer Oustad, Spetsnaz, Michael Idehall, Thorofon and The Benjolin Codex, the spirit of "Metempsychosis" mutates splendidly into new and unexpected territories.
Artwork by Dehn Sora.
Edition of 500 copies in 4 panel Digisleeve. 9 Tracks. Running Time 37:42
Nordvargr.credits:
released May 1, 2019
To order the album go to:
cycliclaw.bandcamp.com/album/tantum-melior

Nordvargr.about:
Cutting out the middle man - go to
www.nordvargr.com/shop?category=Digital
to purchase your digital copy!
Recordings made up of field recordings (amplified sounds from insects and Swedish nature), radio transmissions and improvised electronic soundscapes that all come together to create a suffocating wall of sound.
"Considered to be one of the most complex and strange recordings in Sweden´s most prolific experimental artist Henrik Nordvargr Björkk´s career"

Nordvargr.title: The missing link
Nordvargr.about: Almost ten years after completion this album finally becomes available to the public - it was recorded inbetween "I end forever" and "For the blood is the life" and was then considered too strange and difficult to share with the world. Times change...
Nordvargr.credits:
released November 24, 2013
Some tracks or samples might have snuck into other tracks by the composer over the years, but here all the tracks are presented in their first versions. The original titles of the masterfiles are also preserved.

Nordvargr.title: The secret barbarous names EP
Nordvargr.about:
Cutting out the middle man - go to
www.nordvargr.com/shop?category=Digital
to purchase your digital copy!
"The secret barbarous names" is a vocal based work inspired by the Draconian and Typhonian traditions.
The title refers to the hidden meanings of the countless manuscripts that has been kept secret for millennia - their supposed effectiveness resting in their utterance, not their meaning.
The words of power, vibrated at the correct frequency and amplitude in the correct setting and time, have the power to manifest anything.
Nordvargr.credits:
released August 29, 2016
All voices and DSP: Henrik Nordvargr Björkk
Recorded August 2016 in Villa Bohult
Artwork by Margaux Renaudin
Released in collaboration with  www.belzebez.se
Slightly different version available at  belzebez.bandcamp.com
Extended CD version available from Malignant Records (January 2017)

Nordvargr.title: Tyglad best
Nordvargr.about:
Cutting out the middle man - go to
www.nordvargr.com/shop?category=Digital
to purchase your digital copy!
Track three recorded July 21 2011 in the best possible conditions.
Track two recorded July 22 2011 during the Utøya massacre, Norway. Dedicated to the memory of those who died.
Track one recorded July 23 2011 in a state of shock.
All music performed live on modular synthesizer, no overdubs or processing added.
Performed, composed and recorded by Henrik Nordvargr Björkk @ Villa Bohult.
Nordvargr.credits:
released November 14, 2011
Track one and three released only on 12" vinyl November 14, 2011 by Ufo Mongo/Börft  (www.borft.com)

Cutting out the middle man - go to

This is the continuation of the 2009 album "Untitled Navigations 1" (Beast of Prey 6.5) - a dark journey into the nocturnal Swedish landscapes. The album is based around field recordings of my surroundings which has been altered/enhanced to become an alternate soundtrack to my life and environment.
